meanings.definition: The sexual orientation of being attracted to both men and women.
meanings.sent1: Bisexuality is when someone likes both boys and girls.
meanings.sent2: Her bisexuality allows her to be attracted to people of any gender.
meanings.sent3: Sarah's bisexuality makes her dating life twice as complicated!
meanings.sent4: The rainbow flag represents the diversity of bisexuality in our community.
meanings.sent5: Exploring bisexuality can lead to a deeper understanding of one's own desires.

meanings.definition: The state of being sexually attracted to individuals of both genders.
meanings.sent1: Understanding bisexuality means being open to attraction to all genders.
meanings.sent2: His bisexuality allows him to appreciate beauty in everyone.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of surprises, including a discussion on bisexuality!
meanings.sent4: Her art captures the complexity and beauty of bisexuality in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The film portrayed bisexuality as a natural and valid form of love.
